description: This course explores the ethics of ambition and leadership from a variety of normative perspectives. By studying historical examples and theoretical approaches from Plato to the present day, students learn to reflect on amibition as an irrepressible human passion and an unavoidable element of civic leadership. Students also consider the ways in which their own ambition might relate to their vocation. Prerequisites: completion of BTS-T. Offered alternate years.
name: Ambition and Leadership
prerequisites: Prerequisites: completion of BTS-T. Offered alternate years.
title: Ambition and the Vocation of Leadership
